dialogue.translation: Good evening. How are things?
Good evening. Perfect and your affairs?
Calm. Shall we go out tonight for dinner?
That would be good
Good evening, how are things?

dialogue.text: Tameddit yelhan kullec d ayen yelhan yid-wen
dialogue.translation: Good evening, everything is good with you

dialogue.text: Ssusmen ad nruḥ ad nečč imensi iḍ-a?
dialogue.translation: Quiet, shall we go eat dinner tonight?
It will be good

title: تحية المساء - الشمال الجزائري
scenario: تحية شخص في المساء في الشمال الجزائري

dialogue.translation: Good evening. How is the situation, are you fine?

dialogue.text: مسا الخير. والله غير كلش ريڨلو ونت واش داير فيها؟
dialogue.translation: Good evening. By God everything is settled and you what are you doing?

dialogue.text: الدعوة هانية. واش نخرجو فليل نتعشاو؟
dialogue.translation: Things are calm. Shall we go out at night to have dinner?

dialogue.text: والله غير دير فيا مزية خو.
dialogue.translation: By God, just do me a favor brother

title: تحية المساء - الغرب الجزائري
scenario: تحية شخص في المساء في الغرب الجزائري

dialogue.translation: Good evening. How is the situation?
Good evening. Very good and your affairs?
Going well. Shall we go out to have dinner tonight?
It came at the right time

title: تحية المساء - الشرق الجزائري
scenario: تحية شخص في المساء في الشرق الجزائري

dialogue.translation: Good evening. What are the matters?

dialogue.text: مسا الخير. غايه ونت وش الدعوة عندك؟
dialogue.translation: Good evening. Good and you what's the situation with you?

dialogue.text: أي ترولي. وش تخرج تتعشى ليوم؟
dialogue.translation: Yes, normal. What do you say we go out to have dinner today?
Come on, it's decided, why not

title: تحية المساء - الجنوب الجزائري
scenario: تحية شخص في المساء في الجنوب الجزائري

dialogue.translation: Good evening, how are you?
I'm fine and you what's your news?
Normal, shall we go out today to have dinner outside?
By God, why not. I agree with the idea
